text: Boško Lozica (born November 28, 1952 in Korčula, Yugoslavia) is a former water polo player. As a member of Yugoslavia's water polo team he won a silver medal at the 1980 Summer Olympics. ==See also== * List of Olympic medalists in water polo ==References== ==External links== * Category:1952 births Category:Living people Category:Yugoslav male water polo players Category:Olympic medalists in water polo Category:Olympic silver medalists for Yugoslavia Category:Olympic water polo players of Yugoslavia Category:Water polo players at the 1980 Summer Olympics Category:Water polo players at the 1976 Summer Olympics Category:Medalists at the 1980 Summer Olympics Category:People from Korčula Lozica, Boško
title: Boško Lozica
